summary: This statement discusses our work on the Department of Defense's system for background investigations. It is largely based on the following reports: Personnel Vetting: DOD Needs a Reliable Schedule and Cost Estimate for the National Background Investigation Services Program Personnel Vetting: DOD Needs to Enhance Cybersecurity of Background Investigation Systems Additionally, it updates data from our prior work and shares preliminary observations of ongoing work...
title: Personnel Vetting: Sustained Leadership Is Critical to DOD's New Approach to Its Background Investigation System
